sentence.text: Here we cellular response to interleukin-4, launching from Drosophila models of amyotrophic lateral sclerosis and frontotemporal dementia, that RNA splicing impairs the induction of multiple key stress genes required to protect from disease by reducing the recruitment of the chromatin remodeler covalent chromatin modification to chromatin.
Enhancing chromatin dynamics may be a treatment approach to amyotrophic lateral scleorosis (signal transduction)/frontotemporal dementia (FTD)
